data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yagmur, Ersen Aydin, Tropea, Gioele, Yesilyurt, Fatih (2013): A new species of Euscorpius Thorell, 1876 (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae) from south western Turkey. ZooKeys 348: 29-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.5943, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.5943
